long_description: The streamlined REI Stoke 19 Pack will help keep you hydrated and carry your gear as you fly down trails on foot or bike. Take your multisport fitness training into the great outdoors. Sculpted back foam panel reduces contact areas via multiple peaks and valleys that release vapor; foam structure allows pack to conform to your back for a stable fit. Adjustable, padded and wrapped with breathable mesh, the perforated foam shoulder straps enhance air circulation. Stabilizer wings connect the shoulder straps to the bottom of the pack to stabilize the load and reduce unwanted bouncing. Hipbelt webbing system cinches with a natural forward pulling motion for quick, precise adjustments. Panel-loading zippered main compartment carries the essentials you need for a workout on the trail. Separate hydration pocket holds a reservoir (sold separately) for hands-free drinking on the trail; hydration tube can be routed through either shoulder strap. Front mesh pocket is perfect for quickly stashing a jacket or other items; pocket adjusts to help stabilize and compress the pack's load. Two hipbelt zip pockets store those small essentials you want at your fingertips, such as energy gels, lip balm and sunscreen. The REI Stoke 19 Pack features Quick Clip tool loops that hold an ice axe or trekking poles; clip loop is perfect for attaching a safety strobe (strobe not included). Special buy.
short_description: The streamlined REI Stoke 19 Pack will help keep you hydrated and carry your gear as you fly down trails on foot or bike. Take your multisport fitness training into the great outdoors.
